data.text: @RonKlopfanstein I love Falcon Crest but Flamingo Road with Morgan Fairchild was the bomb 💣 👌
@RonKlopfanstein I’ve never used that. Will check into it.
@kimster_giggles I’ll try that. I use colloidal silver too. That helps a lot.
@RonKlopfanstein Zinc too I think. My mom and stepdad got care packages when they got Covid (maybe from the UAW 🤷🏻‍♀️) and she gave me one. It had vitamins and hand sanitizers.

@RonKlopfanstein I’ve struggled with nausea (I’ve lost over 50 lbs now). The brain fog and headaches, too. 

I successfully quit Suboxone and I’m having no problems with that. 

Pain is my biggest issue but weed helps. 

Thank you for sharing. 😁 I’m glad you’re mending. Vitamins D, E, B & C 🤔

@kimster_giggles I have a power surge for a day or two, then a crash. I get nauseous. Can’t eat w/o getting sick. Awful heartburn. Then cold sweats, aches, weird headaches, brain fog. Always ends with GI issues. Any or all of those symptoms. It’s so random and weird. Seems to be lessening up tho.

@RonKlopfanstein I haven’t felt right since I had Covid. But I’ve had medication issues so I don’t know if it’s Covid related or medication related. My mood has improved, and my head feels clearer, so I feel like I’ll be able to figure it out. 

If you don’t mind, what is a flare like for you?
